Valve gave up on this game, long ago. Matchmaking competitive games are extremely unbalanced. Riddled with cheaters, and just the low end 64 tick on a server just ruins the whole game in general. Easy shots that you would normally hit, on a different server hosted by third-party sites like ESEA or Faceit with 128 tick. Miss on regular 64 tick Valve hosted servers.

Used to be a very fun game for all, now Valve made trading and ranking up through silver so much harder, because they just had to make the game free, so now the silver ppl are stuck bc smurfs, hackers etc can just create a new account and terrorize the silvers forever. I honestly hope Valve clean up their act, this used to be a fun game, now its just a sideshow, that noone likes.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive — это один из наиболее чистых и сбалансированных соревновательных шутеров на PC рынке, в котором все решают командное взаимодействие, ваши рефлексы и понимание основ геймплея.
